AI Description: CLP (Cbc, Lapack, and ParallelCbc) is an open-source linear programming solver that provides both a standalone solver and a framework for building custom optimization algorithms. It is designed to solve large-scale linear programming problems efficiently and offers a range of features for linear optimization.
Core Features: Standalone Linear Programming Solver, Framework For Building Custom Optimization Algorithms, Efficient Solution Of Large-Scale Linear Programming Problems
General Tags: Linear Programming, Optimization, Large-Scale Problems, Open-Source
